Loot Catherine Braithwaite's corpse, and the manor (gold bar)
One day, encounter Marko Dragic by the pond

Catch Cleet before he reaches the market

[days later] Find the convicts again, give them medicine
[days later] Find the convicts for the last time
Meet Dutch and John in a park across from Bronte's house

Escape the lawmen

Wake up on the shore of a tropical island
Get captured, then escape the chain gang
Get shot by a tranq going to rescue local workers

Speak to the doctor, find out

Help Charlotte hunt rabbits

Ride the balloon to the penitentiary and back

[>2 days later] Help Charlotte learn to shoot

Meet Archie by the store, then go find his mother
Listen to Dutch making chess moves, then speak to him

Find Lemuel, take him home

Charlotte Balfour
Donate money to the Quincy Harris Memorial Hall

Fight a gang member

Give the squatters money to leave, then return to the bank

One morning, speak to Uncle
Find Charles, then bet on him to win
Shoot some guys, then leave town
One morning, join Uncle and Charles at the campfire and pull a building down
Meet Sadie in the saloon
Kill Langton and his men, return the bounty target
Buy a home from Cakes Hardwood and Timber

Get a bounty with Sadie and take him to Rhodes

Go the barn, drink the night away

Overhear Jack asking his mom why John doesn't talk about Arthur
